alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab and southwestern Utah Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 727 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southwest of Elberta, or 19 miles west of Nephi, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nephi, Santaquin, Rocky Ridge, Elberta, Mona, Jericho and Little Sahara State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 225 and 242. US Route 6 between mile markers 119 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties
